title: Leeds United Live: Leeds United 1-1 MK Dons - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united face mk dons in their first game of 2016 .
no chris wood for leeds ; souleymane doukara and lewis cook start .
rob hall scores to give dons the lead .
antony kay own goal equalises for leeds .

documents.title: good eveningleeds 0-1 mk dons
text: so leeds extend their unbeaten run to seven games , but that was n't a convincing performance by any means .
it 's taken a comedy own goal to salvage a point against mk dons and they will need to step it up in the next few weeks .
steve evans seems pretty positive that liam bridcutt has not played his last game for leeds united , despite his loan ending today , but he knows that leeds are in desperate need of some strikers .
you can hear our post-match interview with head coach steve evans here .
we 'll be back for the fa cup clash with rotherham next week .
thank you very much for joining us - have a lovely evening , and a very happy new year to you !

documents.title: more from evansleeds 1-1 mk dons
text: we are frustrated with our own performance today and with our inability to pass the ball .
our mental application i ca n't question the physical effort on the pitch .
i was n't happy with what i saw in the first half - we did n't have a shot on goal in the first half .
i had to change it , which is why i brought antenucci on .
it did get better in the second half but i wo n't go over the top .
we ca n't say we were unlucky to not win the game because our performance was n't enough to win it .
we need players , and we know we need players .
we need some quality .
i 've given the president my list but to get it over the line , it takes the football club to do that .

documents.title: steve evans on today 's gameleeds 1-1 mk dons
text: the performance was n't good .
it had a lot of energy but our passing and movement off the ball was lacking .
i think it 's a mental application against a team at the bottom end , rather than the top of the table .
we were fortunate with the goal and i am frustrated .
i 'm upset with the match referee today , i thought he was awful .
but our ability to move the ball and get in people 's faces like we have done in the past few games was missing .

documents.title: more from noelleeds 1-1 mk dons
text: the last two goals at elland road for leeds have been own goals , and it is worrying .
we struggle to score goals , we struggle to get shots on target - that is unacceptable in any shape or form , whether its semi-pro or professional level .
you wo n't win games that way .
people have opportunities and do n't want to shoot , then you do n't have attackers in the box .
it 's not good enough .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: elsewhere in the championshipleeds 1-1 mk dons
text: a goalless draw between ipswich and burnley means that there are still nine points between leeds and the final play-off place .
leeds have , however , slipped a place .
they 're now 13th in the championship , with 32 points from 25 games .

documents.title: thoughts from noelleeds 1-1 mk dons
text: leeds have got out of jail with an own goal .
it 's one of the poorest performances i 've seen in a long time ; sloppy , negative and , without the help from the own goal , i do n't think they would have scored today .
i do n't think formation had anything to do with it .
i just think the players never got going .
they looked tired .
we did n't look like we had any creativity and it was going to take a moment of brilliance or an own goal to get us back into the game .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: in both matches now mk dons fans might feel cheated , but it was a spectacular own goal that robbed them of three points .
leeds were on the back foot for 88 minutes of the game , before they finally woke up - but it took an own goal to force them to look anywhere near competitive .
leeds have got away with one there , and the boos at full time let them know the fans were n't impressed .
there was one - and that 's if we 're being generous - shot on target .
let us know your thoughts , leeds fans , by tweeting us @ twitterid

documents.title: leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: some fine twisting and turning from mirco antenucci and sol bamba wins a corner in the final minute

documents.title: leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: leeds win a throw in after some serious build-up from both sides .
it 's so frustrating that it 's taken an 88th minute own goal for leeds to sharpen up .

documents.title: leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: we 've got five minutes of extra time ahead , which mk dons celebrate by replacing rob hall with joe walsh .

documents.title: leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: charlie taylor takes another free-kick which none of the mk dons players head past their own keeper , and david martin does well to recover from that goal shocker and collect it .

documents.title: breakingown goal kay : leeds 1-1 mk dons
text: oh , antony kay .
elland road is cackling as one as the midfielder heads the ball into his own net .
charlie taylor sent the ball swinging in and kay , from distance out , misheads it straight past his own keeper .
david martin dived but he could n't keep it out from the far post .
what a clanger that is

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: serious boos ringing around elland road as rob hall collides with marco silvestri .
hall goes to ground like he 's been injured , silvestri yanks him back to his feet and hall goes straight back down .
the fans are n't impressed .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: lewie coyle does really well to win the ball back in the area , but mirco antenucci is flagged offside as he goes to up the cross .
there 's a substitute for derby as nicky maynard , who has run his boots off today , is replaced by simon church .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: dons break but marco silvestri does well as he steals off his line and collects the .
ball from under josh murphy .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: the crowd are not impressed and are letting the players know it ; there 's boos and grumbling a-plenty as leeds ' defence lets nicky maynard slip through again .
lewie coyle wins leed back-to-back throws , but liam cooper ca n't control the ball on the halfway line and maynard it up .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: that 's a fantastic save from marco silvestri as nicky maynard comes driving into the box and silvestri 's quick reactions turn the ball away and around the post .
silvestri got liam cooper out of trouble there after maynard robbed him .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: mirco antenucci has done a good job since coming on at half-time ; his marker is having trouble keeping up with him .
it 's rob hall , however , who has the next chance of the game but his strike from distance goes well wide of marco silvestri 's post .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: liam bridcutt floats in a free-kick but it 's high and still rising as it whips over sol bamba 's head and out of play .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: mirco antenucci goes flitting through the dons defence and opts to take on the shot himself ; it 's a nicely guided cross but it takes a slight deflection , and david martin is down to save it .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: there 's a yellow for sam byram , his seventh of the season , after a foul on dean lewington .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: stuart dallas comes darting forwards to up liam cooper 's smart pass , but dons ' defence is much sharper than leeds and a tackle knocks the ball out of dallas ' pass .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: another change for leeds united , as lee erwin replaces soulemayne doukara .
he 'll join mirco antenucci up front .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: there 's a free-kick for charlie taylor but it hammers into the post - it 's miles away from the keeper and rose nicely over the wall , but it 's off the post and out for a goal kick .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: lewis cook breaks from halfway on his own and worms his way through , but it takes the tiniest of touches from a dons player and it deflects away .
leeds keep the ball but dons ' defence come charging down on them , before someone goes through the back of sam byram .

text: stuart dallas is back on the park , just in time to see charlie taylor taken down by a brilliant dons tackle .
it 's been a good few minutes for leeds , as they manage to string a few passes together , and they 're starting to hold on to possession .

text: stuart dallas has gone down injured .
he 's hobbled over to the sidelines for a spot of treatment .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: leeds have changed their formation , moving to 4-4-2 .
mirco antenucci has joined soulemayne doukara up front .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: mirco antenucci was given the nod at half-time , and he 's replaced luke murphy for the start of the second half .
he had a good warm up during the interval and leeds will be hoping he can turn this game around .

documents.title: championship mathmaticsleeds v mk dons
text: maths was never my strong point , but leeds united are indeed nine points clear of the play-offs .
ipswich town and burnley - in fifth and sixth place respectively - face off today at turf moor .
if united win today , they will snatch the three points with both hands and be no more than seven points away from the last play-off position .

documents.title: noel on the first halfleeds 0-1 mk dons
text: it 's sloppy , it 's not concentrated , it 's not controlled ; leeds have n't played the way we expect them to .
they were n't concentrating on simple passes and not doing the right things .
i 've just watched dons ' keeper walking down the tunnel and there 's not a bit of black on him .
his top is like he 's just walked out .
we need to start doing things better .
it 's been scruffy all round and i do think we 're missing chris wood .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: leeds started to push forwards towards the end of the first half but it 's been easy going for mk dons , it has to be said .
they troop off to the sound of boos from the elland road crowd .
leeds have n't been switched on - it 's been sloppy for most of the 45 minutes - and a clearly unimpressed steve evans will have plenty to say at half-time .

leeds are still struggling to get started in this match .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: that 's better from leeds , as soulemayne doukara works the ball to luke murphy , who gets a fine pass through to stuart dallas .
dallas is late on the ball though and leeds are forced to go again .

documents.title: leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: leeds have themselves up slightly but there 's still mistakes creeping in .
they 've been particularly sloppy with their tackles , which they will have to watch as the game goes on .

documents.title: breakinggoal hall : leeds 0-1 mk dons
text: 0-0 everywhere in the championship ?
famous last words
mk dons have been building to that and leeds have helped them with some sloppy defending .
nicky maynard breaks free down the right before cutting the ball back to robert hall , who slides the ball low into the bottom corner .
leeds are behind , again , and dons have lost just one game this season when they 've taken the lead .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: robert hall takes the resulting free-kick and skews it high over the bar .
it 's currently 0-0 everywhere in the championship .
post-christmas blues ?

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: liam bridcutt loses the ball on the edge of the penalty area , before sol bamba brings down nicky maynard in response .
that 's a yellow and some boos from the away end for bamba .
that 's bamba 's sixth caution of the season - if he gets to ten by march , it 's a two game ban for the leeds man .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: the first yellow of the game goes to josh murphy for a foul on lewis cook , before there 's a break in play as sol bamba clatters into keeper david martin .
martin needs treatment - he 's essentially run into a brick wall in a leeds shirt .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: robert hall goes down in the box from a sliding tackle from charlie taylor - hall wants a penalty but the referee gives them a corner instead .
hall and his manager are not happy .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: liam bridcutt is looking to make an impact in the final game of his loan spell , as he works the ball away from the mk dons strikers .
leeds have n't been on it from the start , but bridcutt and charlie taylor have done well so far .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: charlie taylor sends a fine ball in to the area after some good build up from lewis cook , but dean lewington does very well to knock the ball away .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: it 's the odd messy moments that are going to affect leeds , as scott wootton threads a poor pass through to sam byram which the full-back struggles to get to .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: mk dons have been forced to make a change , as carl baker limps off and is replaced by dean bowditch .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: sam byram pulls off a lovely run , dashing from right to left , to up the ball , and floats the ball through for luke murphy .
murphy ca n't it up , however , and it 's blocked by antony kay .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: carl baker is really struggling as he hobbles off to the sidelines .
there 's a bit of stretching and a lot of grimacing for the dons man .
he 's back on , however .
leeds break , as soulemayne doukara crosses in from the right , but it 's a poor cross and dons snatch the ball back .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: it 's been a `` scruffy '' opening ten minutes according to noel , and he 's not wrong - leeds are n't threading their passes together well at all .
there 's a brief break in play , however , as carl baker goes down injured .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: luke murphy does well to sort out a sol bamba mistake , as the leeds man makes a mess of a pass through to liam bridcutt .
murphy is aware enough to clear it away from an oncoming dons player .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: a great run from lewis cook gets the crowd going as he works his way into the area , before dons clear sam byram 's cross .
leeds continue attacking though , but dons are again able to knock soulemayne doukara 's cross in to safety .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: carl baker flings a cross over to the near post from a corner , but sol bamba tackles nicky maynard to end the danger .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: there 's mud all over the place at elland road as sam byram wins the ball for leeds but carl baker charges straight through leeds .
liam cooper does well to stop him but baker had plenty of room there .

documents.title: leeds 0-0 mk dons
text: the big news is that leeds have changed their walk out music .
it 's now layla by eric clapton , which is perfect for air guitar battles .
music aside , we 're underway at elland road , with leeds going towards the kop .

documents.title: head to headleeds v mk dons
text: a bit of a happy reading for leeds fans is that dons have never won at elland road .
in fact , the visitors have n't beaten leeds in the league since their first meeting back in 2008 , where they claimed a 3-1 victory .
leeds have won the last four league outings between the two and have kept a clean sheet in two of those games .
with leeds unbeaten in six , and mk dons not having won a game away from home since the opening of the season against rotherham , the whites should be up for today 's game .

documents.title: reminder of the teamsleeds v mk dons
text: today 's teamsheet # lufc v # mkdons @ twitterid

documents.title: last time outleeds v mk dons
text: when these two met in september 2015 , it was leeds who walked away with a smile on their face as they inflicted a fourth straight defeat on the dons .
chris wood buried a penalty as dons were reduced to ten men , before charlie taylor hammered in a second just before half time .
simon church scored in the 74th minute just to fray those leeds fans nerves some more , but leeds held on for a win .
speaking to bbc radio leeds this week , steve evans said that dons could `` probably feel harshly done by '' in losing the previous fixture - can they inflict a defeat on leeds today ?

documents.title: popey on today 's gameleeds v mk dons
text: it 's always a weird one playing mk dons as its a club that , although established , still makes me feel uneasy about the whole uprooting from wimbledon .
i have to be honest - leeds spawned the win at the moo camp earlier this season .
but , i 'd take that again today .
that 's because three points makes it a great christmas and makes a strong argument for recruitment in the window .
and good luck to martin hywood , who suffers from muscular dystrophy , and who is doing a series of fundraising walks this year to raise £ 6,000 to fight the disease .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: evans on the fixture dramaleeds v mk dons
text: it would n't have been leeds united if they had n't ended the season with some off-field drama , and fans unfortunately got that on tuesday night .
chairman cellino `` reluctantly '' allowed sky cameras into elland road for the match against derby county after initially banning them in protest at the number of leeds fixtures moved for tv .
`` i do n't blame the broadcasters , '' steve evans told adam pope on tuesday night .
`` the broadcasters must want to put leeds on .
`` who would you put on in the championship other than leeds ?
leeds reserves ?
`` the biggest issue is you have to be fair and offer the leeds the right integrity.the president , if he feels the club is being impacted financially , is quite right to raise the issue . ''

documents.title: transfer newsleeds v mk dons
text: the main transfer buzz for leeds this january surrounds liam bridcutt and sam byram .
bridcutt 's emergency loan from sunderland ends this weekend , with today the last game of his loan spell .
united and sunderland only have a `` gentleman 's agreement '' in place for bridcutt to remain at elland road for the rest of the season .
despite struggling in his first game the youngster has had a definite impact on leeds , with the whites taking 12 points from seven games since he arrived .

leeds are keen to extend bridcutt 's contract until may , with a view to signing him permanently over the summer , but everything is dependent on sunderland and whether they receive a better offer for the midfielder .

documents.title: noel on sam byram and transfersleeds v mk dons
text: steve wants to know where he 's at with his players - what deals have been done and what money he will possibly have for signings .
he will have his targets , he 'll have done his homework and worked out who he wants , and he 'll probably have made contact .
if we ca n't sort out the byram saga , and we ca n't up the money we give him , it 's probably best to sell him in this window .
i do n't think he wants to leave , and i do n't want to see him leave , but the club wo n't budge on the money and both sides are at a stalemate .
they can cash in now and try and get as much money for him as possible .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: sam byram : will he stay or will he go ? leeds v mk dons
text: things are hardly any clearer for leeds fans on sam byram 's future .
byram has scored three times and provided two assists since he returned to the starting line-up against wolves in december .
the youngster 's contract negotiations hit headlines throughout 2015 , and byram rejected a contract offer in early december .

steve evans has said he will continue to byram until he is sold , but with byram 's deal ending in june and no agreements yet over continuing with leeds , fans could be saying goodbye to the full-back .

documents.title: `` there 's people smiling at elland road '' leeds v mk dons
text: after a positive december on the field , steve evans has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about the atmosphere at elland road .
`` when we came into the club there was a lot of disappointment in terms of the team , '' evans told bbc leeds .
`` over the last couple of months we 've been able to pull that into line , with some great assistance from the captain and the dressing room .
`` there 's a great focus and a real happy feel inside the football club , with people smiling every day , and that 's what we want . ''

documents.title: noel on today 's teamleeds v mk dons
text: i 'm only concerned that , the other night against derby when doukara .
came on , he was out wide a lot when really you need him tight in .
hopefully steve evans has had a word with him telling him to stay up in that 18 yard box .
he has been a lot stronger this season ; he 's held the ball and looked after it .
it 's important he stays in that central area and provides an outlet .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: breakingteam newsleeds v mk dons
text: steve evans has made two changes to the side that battled against derby county on tuesday .
chris wood has not recovered from a hamstring injury and tom adeyemi drops back to the bench , meaning souleymane doukara and lewis cook will start .
leeds united xi : silvestri , wootton , bamba , cooper , taylor , byram , cook , bridcutt , murphy , dallas , doukara .
mk dons xi : martin , spence , mcfadzean , kay , lewington , potter , carruthers , baker , hall , murphy , maynard .

documents.title: happy new year ! leeds v mk dons
text: good afternoon , and welcome to today 's live text commentary of leeds united v mk dons .
it was a decent festive season for leeds , as they made it through december unbeaten thanks to a draw at home against derby county .
they 've already beaten today 's opponents mk dons on their own turf - can they do the double today ?
keep an eye on us here while you enjoy our commentary on 92.4 fm , dab and freeview channel 719 and see if leeds can kick off the new year with a bang .
